item.title: Speaker: Hunter Biden's Pardon 'Abuse' of Justice System
item.description: President Joe Biden's pardon of son Hunter Biden is an "abuse" of the justice system, House Speaker Mike Johnson said.

item.title: Biden Condemns Hamas' Killing of US-Israeli Soldier
item.description: President Joe Biden condemned the murder by Hamas of an American/Israeli soldier during the terrorists' Oct. 7, 2023, massacre in Israel.
